body_html:
@RanFeldesh On Linux the error is quite descriptive:

# python3
Python 3.5.2 (default, Nov 23 2017, 16:37:01) 
[GCC 5.4.0 20160609] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> tf.linspace(start=1, stop=3, num=3)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_math_ops.py", line 3908, in lin_space
    "LinSpace", start=start, stop=stop, num=num, name=name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 609, in _apply_op_helper
    param_name=input_name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 60, in _SatisfiesTypeConstraint
    ", ".join(dtypes.as_dtype(x).name for x in allowed_list)))
TypeError: Value passed to parameter 'start' has DataType int32 not in list of allowed values: bfloat16, float32, float64
>>> tf.linspace(start=1.0, stop=3.0, num=3.0)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_math_ops.py", line 3908, in lin_space
    "LinSpace", start=start, stop=stop, num=num, name=name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 609, in _apply_op_helper
    param_name=input_name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 60, in _SatisfiesTypeConstraint
    ", ".join(dtypes.as_dtype(x).name for x in allowed_list)))
TypeError: Value passed to parameter 'num' has DataType float32 not in list of allowed values: int32, int64
>>> tf.__version__
'1.9.0'
>>>

body:
@RanFeldesh On Linux the error is quite descriptive:
```
# python3
Python 3.5.2 (default, Nov 23 2017, 16:37:01) 
[GCC 5.4.0 20160609] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import tensorflow as tf
>>> tf.linspace(start=1, stop=3, num=3)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_math_ops.py", line 3908, in lin_space
    "LinSpace", start=start, stop=stop, num=num, name=name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 609, in _apply_op_helper
    param_name=input_name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 60, in _SatisfiesTypeConstraint
    ", ".join(dtypes.as_dtype(x).name for x in allowed_list)))
TypeError: Value passed to parameter 'start' has DataType int32 not in list of allowed values: bfloat16, float32, float64
>>> tf.linspace(start=1.0, stop=3.0, num=3.0)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_math_ops.py", line 3908, in lin_space
    "LinSpace", start=start, stop=stop, num=num, name=name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 609, in _apply_op_helper
    param_name=input_name)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/framework/op_def_library.py", line 60, in _SatisfiesTypeConstraint
    ", ".join(dtypes.as_dtype(x).name for x in allowed_list)))
TypeError: Value passed to parameter 'num' has DataType float32 not in list of allowed values: int32, int64
>>> tf.__version__
'1.9.0'
>>> 

```
